description: Retrieves information about the status and settings of the ADM channel for an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the application. This identifier is displayed as the Project ID on the Amazon Pinpoint console.

nested_items.name: ADMChannelResponse
nested_items.description: Provides information about the status and settings of the ADM (Amazon Device Messaging) channel for an application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the application that the ADM channel applies to.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the ADM channel was enabled.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the ADM channel is enabled for the application.

nested_items.name: HasCredential
nested_items.description: (Not used) This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: (Deprecated) An identifier for the ADM channel. This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: IsArchived
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the ADM channel is archived.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last modified the ADM channel.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the ADM channel was last modified.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The type of messaging or notification platform for the channel. For the ADM channel, this value is ADM.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The current version of the ADM channel.
